bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong gi cha dang /
bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / /bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / /grangs dang cha dang / /bgrang ba dang / /rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu rnam grangs
des kyang 'di ltar/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshad ni tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig
par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ /dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te/ /thal bar
byas pa de las skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ /rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas
der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag ste/ /skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad tu bkod par gyur la// //
de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ /des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas/ /tshul de bzhin du bor te/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu

re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na rig kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di
snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba
stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs
phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ /gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so/ /
bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
ji snyed cig 'das pa dang gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang / /gang dag las 'das te/ rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag /
thams cad btags te rdul phra rab tu brlags na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyams du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa 'am/

rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong

phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /
mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bar shes pa 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams mos par
'gyur gyi/ don 'tshal pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i

tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye

ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed
cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur
thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po

la 'dod pa mi bskyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags

pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag

du phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod

par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe tshad kyang bsam gyis
mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po ngo mtshar lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du

sems nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de

de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de ci nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to/ /

nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do/ /rigs

kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams ni bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yi 'chad pa med de/ nam mkha'i khams la skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/

'tshig pa 'am/ 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni skyo ba dang

yongs su yid 'chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gang la nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de ni 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/

'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/

'gro ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de ni shin du dben pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags

pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smas sos/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa

dang gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /

bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam/

kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan pa dang / gang 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba'i rjes su bslab po zhes sems bskyed pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa dang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis

yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul pa dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/
phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'jug par byed

dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rjes su bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sems skyed cing gom pa bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga

mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya stong gi

char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe byang chub

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bur 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub
sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur ba de dag gi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad

kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba 'dug cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye

ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por gcig car du snang bar gyur ba ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir

chos kyi rnam grangs 'd-i'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung shig /smon lam bsam gyi mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang

zung shig /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas

kye ma sangs rgyas de da ni bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na

byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //

'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ le'u bcwa lnga pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
